cups.unit_file:
[Unit]
Description=CUPS Scheduler
Documentation=man:cupsd(8)
After=network.target nss-user-lookup.target nslcd.service

[Service]
ExecStart=/usr/bin/podman run --name cups-service-backend -p 631:631 {{.ImageName}}
ExecStop=/usr/bin/podman stop -t 10 cups-service-backend
ExecStopPost=/usr/bin/podman rm -f cups-service-backend
Restart=always
WantedBy=printer.target multi-user.target

cron.unit_file:
[Unit]
Description=Regular background program processing daemon
Documentation=man:cron(8)
After=remote-fs.target nss-user-lookup.target

[Service]
ExecStart=/usr/bin/podman run --name cron-service-backend -v /etc/cron.daily:/etc/cron.daily -v /etc/cron.weekly:/etc/cron.weekly -v /etc/cron.monthly:/etc/cron.monthly {{.ImageName}}
ExecStop=/usr/bin/podman stop -t 10 cron-service-backend
ExecStopPost=/usr/bin/podman rm -f cron-service-backend
Restart=always

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target

packagekit.unit_file:
[Unit]
Description=PackageKit Daemon
ConditionPathExists=!/run/ostree-booted
Wants=network-online.target

[Service]
Type=dbus
ExecStart=/usr/bin/podman run --name packagekit-service-backend --privileged --ipc=host --net=host --pid=host -e HOST=/host -v /run:/run -v /var/log:/var/log -v /etc/localtime:/etc/localtime -v /:/host -v /run/dbus/system_bus_socket:/run/dbus/system_bus_socket -v /tmp:/tmp -v /etc/apt:/etc/apt:ro -v /var/lib/apt:/var/lib/apt:ro -v /var/cache/apt:/var/cache/apt:ro --user root:root {{.ImageName}}
ExecStop=/usr/bin/podman stop -t 10 packagekit-service-backend
ExecStopPost=/usr/bin/podman rm -f packagekit-service-backend
Restart=always
BusName=org.freedesktop.PackageKit

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target

wpa_supplicant.unit_file:
[Unit]
Description=Containerized WPA Supplicant Service
Requires=dbus.service
After=network-pre.target dbus.service
Before=network.target shutdown.target

[Service]
Type=dbus
BusName=fi.w1.wpa_supplicant1
ExecStart=/usr/bin/podman run -it --name wpa_supplicant-service-backend --privileged \
  --cap-add=NET_ADMIN \
  --cap-add=NET_RAW \
  --device /dev/net/tun --network=host --pid=host --ipc=host \
  -v /run/dbus/system_bus_socket:/run/dbus/system_bus_socket \
  -v /etc/wpa_supplicant:/etc/wpa_supplicant:ro \
  -v /run/wpa_supplicant:/run/wpa_supplicant \
  --user root:netdev {{.ImageName}}
ExecReload=/bin/kill -HUP $MAINPID
ExecStop=/usr/bin/podman stop wpa_supplicant-service-backend
ExecStopPost=/usr/bin/podman rm wpa_supplicant-service-backend 
Group=netdev
RuntimeDirectory=wpa_supplicant
RuntimeDirectoryMode=0750

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target

power-profiles-daemon.unit_file:
[Unit]
Description=Power Profiles Daemon Backend New (Container)
Conflicts=tuned.service tlp.service auto-cpufreq.service system76-power.service
Before=multi-user.target display-manager.target
After=network.target

[Service]
Type=dbus
BusName=net.hadess.PowerProfiles
Environment=DBUS_SYSTEM_BUS_ADDRESS=unix:path=/run/dbus/system_bus_socket

# Run the container in the foreground
ExecStart=/usr/bin/podman run \
  --name power-profiles-daemon-backend \
  --privileged \
  --network=host \
  -v /sys:/sys \
  -v /proc:/proc \
  -v /dev:/dev \
  -v /run/dbus/system_bus_socket:/run/dbus/system_bus_socket \
  -v /run/udev:/run/udev \
  -v /var/lib/power-profiles-daemon:/var/lib/power-profiles-daemon \
  {{.ImageName}}

# Stop and remove the container on service stop
ExecStop=/usr/bin/podman stop power-profiles-daemon-backend
ExecStopPost=-/usr/bin/podman rm -f power-profiles-daemon-backend

Restart=on-failure
StateDirectory=power-profiles-daemon
StandardOutput=journal
StandardError=journal

[Install]
WantedBy=graphical.target
